# Reference

<!-- DO NOT EDIT: This document was generated by Puppet Strings -->

## Table of Contents

### Classes

* [`types`](#types): Module to manage types
Puppet module to manage default types through hashes in Hiera with the
create_resources() function. This module adds validation and helper functions,
such as ensuring directories. Without specifying any hashes, this module will
take no action.

### Defined types

* [`types::cron`](#types--cron): Define for cron types
For a full description of the cron type check: https://github.com/puppetlabs/puppetlabs-cron_core/blob/main/REFERENCE.md
* [`types::exec`](#types--exec): Define for exec types
For a full description of the exec type check: https://www.puppet.com/docs/puppet/latest/types/exec.html
* [`types::file`](#types--file): Define for file types
For a full description of the exec type check: https://www.puppet.com/docs/puppet/latest/types/file.html
* [`types::file_line`](#types--file_line): Define for file_line types
For a full description of the exec type check: https://github.com/puppetlabs/puppetlabs-stdlib/blob/main/REFERENCE.md#file_line
* [`types::mount`](#types--mount): Define for mount types
For a full description of the mount type check: https://github.com/puppetlabs/puppetlabs-mount_core/blob/main/REFERENCE.md
* [`types::package`](#types--package): Define for package types
For a full description of the exec type check: https://www.puppet.com/docs/puppet/latest/types/package.html
* [`types::selboolean`](#types--selboolean): Define for selboolean types
For a full description of the cron type check: https://github.com/puppetlabs/puppetlabs-selinux_core/blob/main/REFERENCE.md
* [`types::service`](#types--service): Define for service types
For a full description of the exec type check: https://www.puppet.com/docs/puppet/latest/types/service.html

### Data types

* [`Types::Cron::Periodic`](#Types--Cron--Periodic): Data type for cron periodic values (hour, minute, month, monthday, weekday, or special)

## Classes

### <a name="types"></a>`types`

Module to manage types
Puppet module to manage default types through hashes in Hiera with the
create_resources() function. This module adds validation and helper functions,
such as ensuring directories. Without specifying any hashes, this module will
take no action.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `types` class:

* [`crons`](#-types--crons)
* [`execs`](#-types--execs)
* [`file_lines`](#-types--file_lines)
* [`files`](#-types--files)
* [`mounts`](#-types--mounts)
* [`packages`](#-types--packages)
* [`selbooleans`](#-types--selbooleans)
* [`services`](#-types--services)
* [`ensure_packages`](#-types--ensure_packages)

##### <a name="-types--crons"></a>`crons`

Data type: `Hash`

Hash of resource type `cron`.

Default value: `{}`

##### <a name="-types--execs"></a>`execs`

Data type: `Hash`

Hash of resource type `exec`.

Default value: `{}`

##### <a name="-types--file_lines"></a>`file_lines`

Data type: `Hash`

Hash of resource type `file_line`.

Default value: `{}`

##### <a name="-types--files"></a>`files`

Data type: `Hash`

Hash of resource type `file`.

Default value: `{}`

##### <a name="-types--mounts"></a>`mounts`

Data type: `Hash`

Hash of resource type `mount`.

Default value: `{}`

##### <a name="-types--packages"></a>`packages`

Data type: `Hash`

Hash of resource type `package`.

Default value: `{}`

##### <a name="-types--selbooleans"></a>`selbooleans`

Data type: `Hash`

Hash of resource type `selboolean`.

Default value: `{}`

##### <a name="-types--services"></a>`services`

Data type: `Hash`

Hash of resource type `service`.

Default value: `{}`

##### <a name="-types--ensure_packages"></a>`ensure_packages`

Data type: `Array`

Array of packages to install with `ensure_packages`.

Default value: `[]`

##### <a name="-types--cron--command"></a>`command`

Data type: `String[1]`

Value passed to command attribute. Unused if empty.
Check https://github.com/puppetlabs/puppetlabs-cron_core/blob/main/REFERENCE.md#command for more information.

##### <a name="-types--cron--ensure"></a>`ensure`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`

Value passed to ensure attribute. Unused if empty.
Check https://github.com/puppetlabs/puppetlabs-cron_core/blob/main/REFERENCE.md#ensure for more information.

Default value: `'present'`

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-types--mount--ensure"></a>`ensure`

Data type: `Enum['defined', 'present', 'unmounted', 'absent', 'mounted']`

Value passed to ensure attribute. Unused if empty.
Check https://github.com/puppetlabs/puppetlabs-mount_core/blob/main/REFERENCE.md#ensure for more information.

Default value: `'mounted'`

##### <a name="-types--mount--atboot"></a>`atboot`

Data type: `Boolean`

Value passed to atboot attribute. Unused if empty.
Check https://github.com/puppetlabs/puppetlabs-mount_core/blob/main/REFERENCE.md#atboot for more information.

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-types--mount--blockdevice"></a>`blockdevice`

Data type: `Optional[String[1]]`

Value passed to blockdevice attribute. Unused if empty.
Check https://github.com/puppetlabs/puppetlabs-mount_core/blob/main/REFERENCE.md#blockdevice for more information.

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-types--mount--dump"></a>`dump`

Data type: `Optional[String[1]]`

Value passed to dump attribute. Unused if empty.
Check https://github.com/puppetlabs/puppetlabs-mount_core/blob/main/REFERENCE.md#dump for more information.

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-types--mount--options"></a>`options`

Data type: `Optional[String[1]]`

Value passed to options attribute. Unused if empty.
Check https://github.com/puppetlabs/puppetlabs-mount_core/blob/main/REFERENCE.md#options for more information.

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-types--mount--pass"></a>`pass`

Data type: `Optional[String[1]]`

Value passed to pass attribute. Unused if empty.
Check https://github.com/puppetlabs/puppetlabs-mount_core/blob/main/REFERENCE.md#pass for more information.

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-types--mount--provider"></a>`provider`

Data type: `Optional[String[1]]`

Value passed to provider attribute. Unused if empty.
Check https://github.com/puppetlabs/puppetlabs-mount_core/blob/main/REFERENCE.md#provider for more information.

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-types--mount--remounts"></a>`remounts`

Data type: `Optional[Boolean]`

Value passed to remounts attribute. Unused if empty.
Check https://github.com/puppetlabs/puppetlabs-mount_core/blob/main/REFERENCE.md#remounts for more information.

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-types--mount--target"></a>`target`

Data type: `Optional[String[1]]`

Value passed to target attribute. Unused if empty.
Check https://github.com/puppetlabs/puppetlabs-mount_core/blob/main/REFERENCE.md#target for more information.

Default value: `undef`

### <a name="types--package"></a>`types::package`

* [`ensure`](#-types--package--ensure)
* [`adminfile`](#-types--package--adminfile)
* [`allowcdrom`](#-types--package--allowcdrom)
* [`configfiles`](#-types--package--configfiles)

* [`source`](#-types--package--source)
* [`uninstall_options`](#-types--package--uninstall_options)

* [`manifest`](#-types--service--manifest)
* [`path`](#-types--service--path)
* [`pattern`](#-types--service--pattern)
* [`provider`](#-types--service--provider)
* [`restart`](#-types--service--restart)
* [`start`](#-types--service--start)
* [`status`](#-types--service--status)
* [`stop`](#-types--service--stop)

##### <a name="-types--service--ensure"></a>`ensure`

Value passed to ensure attribute. Unused if empty.
Check https://www.puppet.com/docs/puppet/latest/types/service.html#service-attribute-ensure for more information.

Default value: `'running'`

## Data types

### <a name="Types--Cron--Periodic"></a>`Types::Cron::Periodic`

Data type for cron periodic values (hour, minute, month, monthday, weekday, or special)

Alias of `Variant[Array, Integer, String[1]]`
